Title:
The agaricoid genus Kinia is a new member of the Pluteoid
clade subordinate to Melanoleuca
Keywords:
Agaricomycetes  Amanitaceae  Pluteaceae  bilateral gill
trama  taxonomy
Abstract:
Based on maximum likelihood and Bayesian LSU rDNA
analyses, the recently described monotypic genus Kinia is reduced to a
subgenus of the genus Melanoleuca, a genus exhibiting phylogenetic
affinities with members of the Pluteaceae within the Pluteoid clade. The
new combination Melanoleuca rivernensis and the new subgenus Kinia, are
introduced.
